title: Any adjustments required?
h1: Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or long term health condition that means you need support during your case?
p: We know some people need support to access information and use our services. We often call this a reasonable adjustment. Some reasonable adjustments need to be agreed by the judge or HMCTS. You can discuss with the tribunal if your needs change.

detailsSummary.heading: What support is available?
detailsSummary.bullet1: documents in alternative formats, colours and fonts
detailsSummary.bullet2: help with communicating, sight, hearing, speaking and interpretation
detailsSummary.bullet3: access and mobility support if a hearing takes place in person

noSupport: No - I do not need any extra support at this time
